reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfasts here are a delight (pancakes, fresh orange juice etc), with wonderful views over the roof tops towards the sea. The rooms are nicely done out, though some can be a bit airless (we moved from the first to second floor which was a big improvement). If you can get a room with exterior window then all the better (none were available when we were there though we had a look inside). The staff are great, very friendly and went out of their way to help.
reviews.title: Wonderful views

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Marosko for five nights this October and it was a wonderful experience.
reviews.title: Warm welcome guaranteed

reviews.text: Mari and Rosko live in the Riad and take great pride in it so when you stay here you are genuinely being welcomed into their home. They are both very friendly as are all the staff here. As we stayed during Ramadam it was impossible to buy alcohol in the local shops so Rosko gave us a bottle of wine. When we first arrived we had no Dirham on us and Rosko offered us 500 of his own and said to give it back to him whenever we'd found a machine.
reviews.title: 2 nights in Marosko

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast on the roof is great. We only have positive things to say about this Riad.
reviews.title: Beautiful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed in Marosko 2 nitghs. It is near to the bus station, so is easy to get. Mari is very nice and marked the site to us. We lived in the ground floor , the room is comfortable and with morocan style. it is well decorated and can available up to 4-5ppl.
reviews.title: Very relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Don't miss the album on the first floor, you will find some incredible photos about the riad and Mari!
reviews.title: Riad Marosko
